AgencyPage.title: About BM Agency
AgencyPage.description: Since 2021, we have been helping businesses with their digital transformation with passion, expertise, and innovation. Our mission: to make your brand shine in the digital universe.

hero.description: Since 2021, we have been helping businesses with their digital transformation with passion, expertise, and innovation. Our mission: to make your brand shine in the digital universe.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: BM Agency was born from the passion of two visionary entrepreneurs. Since our creation in 2021, we have grown while maintaining the same ambition: to guide our clients toward digital success with innovative and personalized solutions.
story.paragraph2: Today, with a team of over 50 experts and 20 successful projects, we have become a trusted partner for businesses of all sizes.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: For over 3 years, BM Agency has been helping businesses with their digital transformation with passion and expertise.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We believe that digital is an essential growth lever for all businesses. Our mission is to guide our clients through this transformation with innovative and personalized solutions.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the passionate experts who make BM Agency successful.

two.content: The BM Agency team perfectly understands the specificities of the Cameroonian market. Results exceeded our expectations.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your most common questions.

resultsTime.question: How long does it take to see results?
resultsTime.answer: Depending on the services, initial results are visible within 1 to 6 months. We establish a precise timeline during our first consultation.

customSolutions.question: Do you offer custom packages?
customSolutions.answer: Absolutely! Every business is unique, which is why we create personalized solutions tailored to your needs and budget.

pricing.question: What are your rates?
pricing.answer: Our rates vary depending on the project's complexity. We provide free and transparent quotes after an initial consultation.

companySizes.question: Do you work with businesses of all sizes?
companySizes.answer: Yes, we work with both startups and large enterprises, with solutions adapted to each structure.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about our services and processes.

whatWeDo.question: What does BM Agency do?
whatWeDo.answer: We provide comprehensive digital solutions including web development, digital marketing, branding, and digital strategy to help businesses grow their online presence.

location.question: Where are you located?
location.answer: Our main office is located at 11595 Yaoundé-Kondengui, Cameroon.

workingHours.question: What are your working hours?
workingHours.answer: Our office is open Monday to Friday from 8 AM to 5 PM. We're available for meetings by appointment outside these hours.

startProject.question: How do I start a project with you?
startProject.answer: Simply contact us through our contact form, email, or phone. We'll schedule a consultation to discuss your project requirements and provide a customized proposal.

timeline.question: How long does a typical project take?
timeline.answer: Project timelines vary depending on the scope and complexity. A standard website typically takes 4-8 weeks, while more complex projects may take several months.

teamSize.question: What size companies do you work with?
teamSize.answer: We work with businesses of all sizes, from startups to large enterprises, across various industries.

pricing.question: How do you price your services?
pricing.answer: Our pricing is based on the scope and requirements of each project. We provide detailed quotes after understanding your specific needs.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept bank transfers, mobile money, and credit card payments. Payment terms are outlined in our project proposals.

maintenance.question: Do you provide maintenance after project completion?
maintenance.answer: Yes, we offer various maintenance and support packages to ensure your digital assets remain up-to-date and secure.

meeting.question: Can we meet in person to discuss my project?
meeting.answer: Absolutely! We welcome in-person meetings at our office in Yaoundé. Please contact us to schedule an appointment.

FAQ.noResults: No results found. Try different keywords or contact us directly.
